nodes.text: Ver Iflan was a male individual who, at some point, was imprisoned by the Galactic Empire. Iflan and two other prisoners, Caern Adan and Kairos, realized their interrogation schedule matched up, and Iflan devised a plan to escape, reprogramming their interrogation droid. While Iflan himself was unable to see his plan succeed, Adan and Kairos escaped with the droid.
